item.title: Async Await
item.description: The problem Our node program has to perform some operation in a precise order. In details, we want to: read a json file compile an Handlebar template with the result data copy all the assets in the output directory produce an html and a pdf from the compiled html The first step is writing some asynchronous function that will return a Promise. Then we will put everything togheter using both async/await and the classic then chaining method

item.title: Centos LAMP setup
item.description: Start Once you are logged into the machine via ssh, you may want to check the OS you are working with, using the command $ cat /etc/*-release The shell output should be something like CentOS release 6.3 (Final) Now letâ€™s start installing the rest of the stack Apache To install Apache, just run $ sudo yum install httpd and type y when the system ask for confirm.
